title: Modern Loft with Stunning Views
description: A stylish loft in the heart of the city, offering panoramic views and a comfortable living space.

reviews.comment: Incredible views and a beautiful apartment. Highly recommended!
The location is perfect. The loft is clean and modern.

houseRules: Not suitable for children and infants

title: Cozy Beachfront Cottage
description: Relax and unwind in this charming cottage just steps from the sand. Perfect for a family getaway.

reviews.comment: Fantastic location! The kids loved the beach.
A truly cozy and relaxing spot. Highly recommend!

title: Chic Studio near Eiffel Tower
description: Elegant and compact studio in a prime location, perfect for a romantic Parisian escape.

reviews.comment: Perfect location for exploring Paris. Very clean and stylish.

title: Rustic Cabin in the Redwood Forest
description: Escape the city in this secluded cabin surrounded by majestic redwood trees. Ideal for nature lovers.

reviews.comment: Pure tranquility! The cabin is charming and the forest is stunning.

title: Luxury Penthouse with Rooftop Pool
description: Experience the high life in this stunning penthouse with a private rooftop infinity pool and 360-degree city views.

reviews.comment: The best place I have ever stayed. The pool deck is insane!

title: Traditional Ryokan with Onsen Access
description: Authentic Japanese experience with tatami mats, a beautiful garden, and exclusive access to a natural hot spring (onsen).

reviews.comment: A serene and unforgettable stay. Truly felt like I was experiencing authentic Japan.

houseRules: Respect the silence of the area

title: Ski-in/Ski-out Chalet
description: Beautiful wooden chalet right on the slopes. Features a large stone fireplace and hot tub.

reviews.comment: Unbelievable convenience for skiing! The chalet is spacious and very well-kept.

houseRules: No outside boots inside the living area

title: Historic Townhouse in Old Quarter
description: A beautifully restored 19th-century townhouse. Full of character and close to all historical sights.

reviews.comment: Authentic and wonderful. Loved the atmosphere and the proximity to the river.

title: Minimalist Condo with Ocean View Balcony
description: Clean, modern design with an expansive balcony overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. A breath of fresh air.

location.address: Avenida 24 de Julho, Cais do Sodré

reviews.comment: Incredible views and the apartment is spotless. Very convenient access to public transport.

title: Safari Tent Glamping Experience
description: Luxury glamping tent in a private game reserve. Wake up to the sounds of the African bush.

reviews.comment: An incredible once-in-a-lifetime experience. The service was impeccable and the animals were breathtaking.

houseRules: Stay in designated areas for safety

title: Floating Home on Amsterdam Canal
description: Unique stay on a beautifully converted house boat. Enjoy the tranquil life on the canal with easy access to the city center.

reviews.comment: Staying on a houseboat was so cool! It's quiet, spacious, and centrally located.

title: Vineyard Villa with Private Tasting Room
description: A stunning villa in the heart of wine country. Enjoy rolling hills, a large pool, and complimentary wine tasting.

reviews.comment: A dream vacation! The villa is breathtaking and the wine is excellent.

title: Minimalist Tiny Home with Garden
description: Cozy, thoughtfully designed tiny home maximizing space and comfort. Perfect for a solo traveler or couple.

reviews.comment: Loved the tiny home experience. So much thought put into the design and functionality.

title: Tropical Bungalow with Hammocks
description: Open-air living in a vibrant, artistic bungalow. A short walk to the beach and local markets.

reviews.comment: A true jungle paradise! The open-air concept is refreshing.

title: Modern Apartment in Historic Center
description: Newly renovated apartment in a historical building, blending old-world charm with contemporary comfort.

reviews.comment: Excellent location and a lovely, quiet apartment. Highly recommend.

title: Desert Earthship Retreat
description: An off-grid, sustainable home designed to blend into the New Mexico high desert landscape. Totally unique and peaceful.

reviews.comment: An amazing experience in sustainable living. Peaceful and inspiring.

title: Central London Mews House
description: A charming, quiet mews house in a desirable central London neighborhood. A rare find!

reviews.comment: The perfect London base. Quiet and luxurious in the heart of the city.

title: Ski Loft with Hot Tub
description: A spacious, modern loft ideal for a ski trip, featuring an outdoor hot tub and mountain views.

reviews.comment: Perfect spot for our ski trip. The hot tub after a long day on the slopes was amazing.

title: Ocean View Apartment in Ipanema
description: Wake up to the stunning views of Ipanema beach in this bright, high-floor apartment.

reviews.comment: The view is unbelievable. A spacious and clean apartment in a great part of Rio.

title: Artist's Studio in Montmartre
description: A charming, light-filled studio with high ceilings in the historic artistic district of Paris.

reviews.comment: Small but perfectly formed. Great base for exploring Montmartre.

title: Luxury Yacht Charter (Docked)
description: Stay in luxury on a fully equipped yacht docked in a lively harbor. Experience a different kind of accommodation.

reviews.comment: A fantastic experience! Staying on the water was so relaxing and the yacht is gorgeous.

title: Family Home near Disney World
description: Large, modern house with a private pool and game room, minutes away from the major theme parks.

reviews.comment: Perfect for a large family! Close to the parks and the kids loved the pool.

houseRules: No glass containers in pool area

title: Heritage Colonial in Hanoi Old Quarter
description: Stay in a beautifully preserved colonial building in the bustling heart of Hanoi, near Hoan Kiem Lake.

reviews.comment: Fantastic location for exploring the Old Quarter. Mai was a wonderful host.

title: Lakefront Lodge with Sauna
description: A quiet, secluded lodge on the shore of a clear lake. Perfect for fishing, hiking, and relaxing in the sauna.

reviews.comment: The quintessential Finnish experience. The sauna and lake are spectacular.

title: Designer Apartment in Sydney Harbour
description: Sleek, architecturally designed apartment with breathtaking views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge and Opera House.

reviews.comment: The most spectacular view in Sydney. Apartment is immaculate.

title: Rustic Farm Stay with Alpaca Friends
description: A charming farmhouse offering a unique stay on a working farm. Perfect for animal lovers and a quiet escape.

reviews.comment: The alpacas were so cute! A very peaceful and authentic New Zealand stay.

houseRules: Close all gates to keep livestock contained

title: Mid-Century Modern Palm Springs Home
description: Iconic mid-century architecture with a pool, clean lines, and a desert oasis feel.

reviews.comment: Absolute mid-century heaven. The pool area is stunning and very private.

houseRules: No loud music by the pool after 9 PM

title: Stone Tower in Medieval Village
description: A truly unique experience in a multi-level converted watchtower within a preserved medieval Italian village.

reviews.comment: An utterly unique stay. The views from the top are worth the climb!

title: Contemporary Loft in Downtown Tokyo
description: Sleek, Japanese-minimalist design in a high-rise building, steps away from Shinjuku's nightlife and transport.

reviews.comment: Impeccably clean and stylish apartment. The location is unbeatable for exploring Tokyo.

title: Mountain View Dome Home
description: Geodesic dome home offering a 360-degree view of the mountains. A cozy, architectural marvel.

reviews.comment: An amazing architectural space with stunning views of the volcano!

title: Executive Suite with Boardroom
description: A spacious apartment designed for business travelers, featuring a dedicated workspace and small meeting area.

reviews.comment: Excellent for business travel. Great location and a reliable workspace.
